isColliding

public static boolean isColliding(PointF circle1Center,
                                  float circle1Radius,
                                  PointF circle2Center,
                                  float circle2Radius)
Check if the two circle are colliding

Parameters:
circle1Center - Center point of the first circle
circle1Radius - Radius of the first circle
circle2Center - Center point of the second circle
circle2Radius - Radius of the second circle
Returns:
true,if the two circles are colliding.
